dc_title_s: Mixed-strain housing for female C57BL/6, DBA/2, and BALB/c mice: Validating a split-plot design that promotes refinement and reduction
dc_description_s: Validating a novel housing method for inbred mice: mixed-strain housing.  To see if this housing method affected strain-typical mouse phenotypes, if variance in the data was affected, and how statistical power was increased through this split-plot design.
